abstract: Let Alison Romanâ€™s spicy noodle soup with mushroom and herbs improve your mood, whatever it may be.
lead_paragraph: Good morning. The air was soft this weekend in New York, balmy, leaving everyone blinking, a little stunned, caught between the pleasure of the weather and the calendar facts. One hundred years ago, the average temperature for this date in this city hovered below freezing. That average temperature, The Times reported on January 12, 1920, had held for the preceding 33 years.
